headline: and I'm interested in all things tech, especially things that make people's lives easier. Check out my projects!

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.catchPhrase: What you're looking at right now.
projects.description: A responsive website that gave me plenty of practice using React and Bootstrap. Avoided CSS at all costs. Hosted on Heroku. Runs Express on Node.js. Other projects use the API which connects to a MongoDB Atlas database. I only paid money for this domain. Everything else was free, for now.
